com.revature.dao

Class UserDaoSql

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.dao.UserDaoSql
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserDao

    public class UserDaoSql
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserDao
    Handles the saving and fetching of user data with the remote SQL database on AWS. Fetch a single user or save a new one. Set a friend or fetch all friends. Also fetch the password of a user for comparison for login.
    Author:
    Kristoffer Spencer

      • getInstance

        public static UserDaoSql getInstance()
        Package private getter for the instance. The instance is meant to be retrieved from the interface so that if a different implementation is used to manage data, no code beyond the interface is needed to be modified.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance of this dao

        public User login(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws java.sql.SQLException

      • getFriendIDs

        private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> getFriendIDs(int userID)
                                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Helper method to break up code. Takes the user's ID and gets the list of their friends' ids
        Parameters:
        userID - The id of the logged in user
        Returns:
        A LinkedList of the ids of the friends. Works as a queue
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when there's an issue talking to the db

      • createIDsString

        private java.lang.String createIDsString(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> friendIDs)
        Helper method to cut down the size of methods. Uses the list of friend IDs to make a string to finish the query WHERE clause
        Parameters:
        friendIDs - A linkedList of friendIDs
        Returns:
        A string that of the ids. Ex: "1 OR 3 OR 2"

      • getFriendNames

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFriendNames(java.lang.String idList)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Helper method to break up code. Takes in the formated id string and retreives the list of the friends' usernames
        Parameters:
        idList - String of ids ex: "1 OR 3 OR 2"
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the friends' usernames
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when there's an issue talking to the db

      • updateStats

        public boolean updateStats(User user)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method takes a user object and updates the badges, wins and losses in the db to the current numbers given by the passed in user obj
        Specified by:
        updateStats in interface UserDao
        Parameters:
        user - The user object which contains the states
        Returns:
        Returns whether only one record was updated
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when there's an issue talking to the db
